name: v0.2.2
body:
## Using with Bazel 7.6.1 or greater

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazel_linux_packages", version = "v0.2.2")
```


## What's Changed
* feat: add attrs to configure the `glob()` pattern by @lukasoyen in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/127


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/compare/v0.2.1...v0.2.2

name: v0.2.1
body:
## Using with Bazel 7.6.1 or greater

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazel_linux_packages", version = "v0.2.1")
```


## What's Changed
* ci: use 7.6.1 instead of 7.6.x by @lukasoyen in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/123


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/compare/v0.2.0...v0.2.1

name: v0.2.0
body:
## Using with Bazel 7.6.1 or greater

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazel_linux_packages", version = "v0.2.0")
```


## What's Changed
* build(deps): bump bazel-contrib/setup-bazel from 0.14.0 to 0.15.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/84
* Updated platforms to 1.0.0 by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/86
* Updated buildifier_prebuilt to 8.2.0 by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/87
* Updated gazelle to 0.44.0 by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/90
* docs: Add section to compare to `rules_distroless` by @lukasoyen in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/105
* Updated bazel_skylib_gazelle_plugin to 1.8.1 by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/108
* Updated aspect_bazel_lib to 2.20.0 by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/113
* Updated rules_cc to 0.1.4 by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/117
* Updated bazel_skylib to 1.8.1 by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/116
* Various updates by @lukasoyen in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/119
* feat: restore bazel 7.6.1 compatibility by @lukasoyen in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/120


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/compare/v0.1.1...v0.2.0

name: v0.1.1
body:
## Using with Bazel 8.1 or greater

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazel_linux_packages", version = "v0.1.1")
```


## What's Changed
* feat: introduce attribute `post_install_cmd` by @lukasoyen in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/80


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/compare/v0.1.0...v0.1.1

name: v0.1.0
body:
## Using with Bazel 8.1 or greater

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazel_linux_packages", version = "v0.1.0")
```


## What's Changed
* build(deps): bump VirtusLab/bazel-steward from 1.7.0 to 1.7.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/65
* Updated buildifier_prebuilt to 8.0.3 by @github-actions in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/66
* Fixes by @lukasoyen in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/68
* Convenience extension by @lukasoyen in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/69
* feat: make `apt` extension reproducible by @lukasoyen in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/70
* feat: generate the package file integrities by @lukasoyen in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/71
* Updated toolchains_llvm to 1.4.0 by @github-actions in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/72
* Updated bazel to 8.2.0 by @github-actions in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/73
* Updated gazelle to 0.43.0 by @github-actions in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/74
* Updated bazel to 8.2.1 by @github-actions in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/75
* Updated aspect_bazel_lib to 2.15.3 by @github-actions in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/76
* Updated aspect_bazel_lib to 2.16.0 by @github-actions in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/77
* ci: update `MODULE.bazel.lock` by @lukasoyen in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/78
* fix: remove symlinks in install that `glob()` chokes on by @lukasoyen in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/79


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/compare/v0.0.7...v0.1.0

name: v0.0.7
body:
## Using with Bazel 8.1 or greater

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazel_linux_packages", version = "v0.0.7")
```


## What's Changed
* refactor: update e2e/toolchains/gcc example by @lukasoyen in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/60
* test: limit sysroot packages for e2e/llvm_toolchain example by @lukasoyen in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/61
* ci: fix bazel-steward config by @lukasoyen in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/62
* ci: fix bazel-steward config location by @lukasoyen in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/63
* feat: new attribute add_files for install() by @lukasoyen in https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/pull/64


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/compare/v0.0.6...v0.0.7

name: v0.0.6
body:

```
bazel_dep(name = "bazel_linux_packages", version = "0.0.6")
```

name: v0.0.4
body:
## Using with Bzlmod with Bazel 8 or greater

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "linux_packages", version = "v0.0.4")
```

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lukasoyen/bazel_linux_packages/compare/v0.0.3...v0.0.4
